Thanks, Tom.  I'll take a look at doing it that way too.

This seems to be my week for premature posting to groups.  I seem to
have figured out what I was doing wrong in working with the XML.  I'll
claim lack of sleep I think...

Rob.

--- In archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com, Tom Emerson <Tree@b...> wrote:
> Personally I'd just use 'sed' to replace certain keywords in your
> templates with the values you want. Doesn't seem worth making anything
> more complex, certainly not worth mucking with the XML directly.
> 
> -- 
> Tom Emerson                                          Basis
Technology Corp.

http://www.basistech.com
